Up & Up Kids Lotion SPF 50-10.4 oz is one summer essential you should never be without. This convenient 10.4 oz size easily stores in your beach bag, purse or your car so its available when you need it. Sunscreen is so vital to your overall health and to keeping your skin functioning properly. Protect yourself, your kids and the rest of your family by having a tube or two of Up & Ups 50 SPF sunscreen on hand at all times. This sun lotion applies easily to all areas of your body, especially your face, for all over coverage that lasts and lasts. Water resistant, hypoallergenic, PABA free and fragrance free sunscreen; what more could you ask for? Oh, yes, a completely reasonable price too.

description:
Don't shun the sun! Embrace the day with biodegradable sunscreens that provide broad spectrum protection without oxybenzone or vitamin A. Extracts in these gluten free, botanically-based sunscreen lotions keep skin nourished and healthy-looking. Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because we are committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business. With our products, the way that we make them, and how we treat others, we want to inspire and uplift women from head to soul.
-Convenient single-touch, spray-at-any-angle application with an eco-friendly, aerosol-free, air-powered system that uses no chemical
or flammable propellants
-Water resistant (80 minutes) with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 protection against sunburn, skin cancer
and premature signs of aging
-Biodegradable, hypo-allergenic, gluten free and recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation
-100% vegetarian ingredients
-NO: oxybenzone, parabens or animal testing
title: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Active Kids Clear Sunscreen Spray - SPF 50 - 6oz

bullets: Spray-on sunscreen helps ensure even coverage
Water-resistant formula means the kids won’t have to slow down
SPF 50 helps keep them protected against skin damage

description:
La Roche-Posay Anthelios Kids Gentle Sunscreen Lotion for Face and Body, SPF 60 developed with dermatologists and formulated with ingredients selected for children's sensitive skin. Anthelios Kids sunscreen is a gentle sunblock for children age 3-12 and provides advanced broad protection SPF 60.

• Pediatrician tested
• Paraben-free
• Fragrance-free
• Non-comedogenic
• Oxybenzone-free
• Water resistant (80 minutes)

Sun screen includes the powerful CELL-OX SHIED technology with antioxidants, including Vitamin E to help neutralize skin damaging free radicals. Sunscreen lotion has a combination of photostable UVA / UVB filters chosen for its synergistic effect to deliver broad-spectrum protection.

Kids sunscreen has a lightweight, comforting lotion texture that applies easily, leaving skin feeling soft and smooth.

How to Use:
Apply kids sunscreen generously15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating. Immediately after towel drying, at least every 2 hours.

Recommended by 25,000 dermatologists worldwide, La Roche-Posay offers unique daily skincare developed using a strict formulation charter and stringent clinical testing for efficacy and safety, even on sensitive skin.
title: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Kids Gentle Sunscreen Lotion for Face and Body- SPF 60 - 6.7oz

description:
Don't shun the sun! Embrace the day with biodegradable sunscreens that provide broad spectrum protection without oxybenzone or vitamin A. Extracts in these gluten free, botanically-based sunscreen lotions keep skin nourished and healthy-looking. Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because we are committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business. With our products, the way that we make them, and how we treat others, we want to inspire and uplift women from head to soul.
-Fast-absorbing, tear-free, gluten-free , very water resistant (up to 80 minutes) , biodegradable, broad spectrum protection for active kids
-Recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation
-100% vegetarian ingredients
-No animal testing
-NO: oxybenzone, parabens or vitamin A
title: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Kids Sunscreen Lotion - SPF 45 - 4oz

This physical sunscreen features PURESCREEN®, which contains titanium dioxide, zinc oxide, and 100 percent naturally sourced sunscreen ingredients. NEUTROGENA® PURE & FREE® Baby Sunscreen Stick is water-resistant for up to 80 minutes. It’s also hypoallergenic, PABA-free, and fragrance-free. description:
Mineral-based Sunscreen Spray

Your baby-safe world just got bigger! It’s a big, wide world out there and your baby wants at it. But sunburn and damage to sensitive skin isn’t anything you want them to explore. Our mineral- based SPF formulas provide broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection and glides on smooth for effortless application. Non-allergenic and tear free, so it can go on whatever part of your baby the sun’s gonna shine.

No: PABA, phthalates, parabens, fragrances, or nano-particles

Perfect for high exposure areas and targeted protection
Broad spectrum SPF 50+
UVA + UVB Protection
Water resistant (80 minutes)
Tear free
Non-allergenic
Pediatrician & Dermatologist tested
Never tested on animals

Natural Insect Repellent

Get rid of what’s buggin’ your baby They’re not gonna be an indoor baby forever. But before you have to deal with the mean girls and bullies there are pesky mosquitoes, gnats and flies. So you’ve got this natural DEET free insect repellent. The power of natural essential aromatic oils (Citronella, Peppermint, Rosemary, Lemongrass & Geranium) keeps babies safe and free. Our blend of essential oils is pungent to insects, especially mosquitoes, smells great and is safe for whole family. We’ve got the creepy critters covered. High school? That’ll be up to you.

No: DEET, parabens, sulfates, phthalates, artificial fragrances or dyes

Plant-based ingredients
Made with 100% natural essential oils—Citronella, Peppermint, Rosemary, Lemongrass & Geranium
Helps to keep mosquitoes, gnats and flies away
DEET free
Non-greasy formula
Never tested on animals
title: Babyganics Sun & Bug Duo Set
bullet_description: Features: Blocks UVA Rays, Blocks UVB Rays, Water resistant, broad spectrum protection

description: An effective mineral sunscreen that's as mild as water on skin. AVEENO® Baby CONTINUOUS PROTECTION® Sunscreen Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 contains 100% naturally sourced zinc oxide, a widely recommended mineral sunscreen ingredient. The sunscreen provides superior broad spectrum protection from UVA/UVB rays. Its non-greasy, tear-free formula helps prevent moisture loss and is sweat and water resistant for 80 minutes.

Rated as a 2015 Best Beach and Sport Sunscreen by the EWG (Environmental Working Group). Fragrance-free. Paraben, Phthalate, and Phenoxyethanol free. Formulated with ACTIVE NATURALS® Oat Extract, titanium dioxide and zinc oxide, this broad-spectrum sunscreen forms a protective barrier on top of the skin that scatters UVA and UVB rays for superior sun protection. Oil-free, hypoallergenic, and sweat and water resistant for 80 minutes, it keeps your baby’s skin happy and is gentle.

description: Your little crawler is also a constant explorer. We say "go forth and conquer! "With our outdoor essentials kit, your baby can brave the great outdoors without worry. Our SPF formulas provide broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection and glide on smooth for effortless application. Our alcohol-free hand sanitizer eliminates germs and moisturizes skin. Baby exploration is an important part of growing boldly which is why we make sure we've got you covered. No: PABA, phthalates, parabens, fragrances or nano-particles
